error.title: Form Not Found
error.description: The form you're looking for doesn't exist or you don't have permission to view it.

quickActions.heading: Quick Actions
quickActions.description: Manage your form with powerful tools

delete.title: Delete Form
delete.description: Are you sure you want to delete "{{formTitle}}"? This action cannot be undone and will permanently delete the form and all its responses.

unpublish.title: Unpublish Form
unpublish.description: Are you sure you want to unpublish "{{formTitle}}"? This will make the form unavailable to users and stop accepting new responses.

collectResponses.title: Collect Responses
collectResponses.description: Share this link to collect responses for "{{formTitle}}"

collaborative.title: Form structure is now collaborative
collaborative.description: Form pages and fields are managed through real-time collaboration. Use the form builder to edit your form structure.
